verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: stunned] [ARG1: fellow leaders] [ARGM-LOC: at last week 's gathering of the world 's wealthiest nations] [ARGM-MNR: by making coarse jokes about illegal immigration and terrorism] .
[ARG0: President Trump] stunned fellow leaders at last week 's gathering of the world 's wealthiest nations by [V: making] [ARG1: coarse jokes about illegal immigration and terrorism] .
